hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -f "/usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh" ]; then . /usr/local/docker-config/setProxy.sh fi
cp /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/jboss-eap-7.4.0.zip jboss.zip
cp /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/jboss-alpine-dockerfile Dockerfile
#ENTRYPOINT ["/opt/jboss/wildfly/bin/standalone.sh", "-b", "0.0.0.0"] docker build --build-arg http_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg https_proxy=$http_proxy --build-arg no_proxy="$no_proxy" \ --build-arg HTTP_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg HTTPS_PROXY=$http_proxy --build-arg NO_PROXY="$no_proxy" \ --build-arg PIC_SURE_API_VERSION=LATEST --build-arg PIC_SURE_AUTH_VERSION=LATEST --build-arg PIC_SURE_PASSTHRU_RESOURCE_VERSION=LATEST \ -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-jbosseap:${pipeline_build_id} . docker tag hms-dbmi/pic-sure-jbosseap:${pipeline_build_id} hms-dbmi/pic-sure-jbosseap:LATEST
rm -rf jboss.zip
